item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: @Steve, <a href="http://www.hyperborea.org/journal/archives/2006/06/01/autofill-weirdness/" rel="nofollow">Known issue</a>. I installed version 3 (beta) of the toolbar and appears to be working properly. Otherwise, I'm stumped how to fix this -- the fix is way beyond my noob html skills.
item.content:encoded: @Steve, Known issue. I installed version 3 (beta) of the toolbar and appears to be working properly. Otherwise, I’m stumped how to fix this — the fix is way beyond my noob html skills.

item.title: By: steve
item.dc:creator: steve
item.description:
Who the hells sells fiery enchant for 29 gold? moreso, who buys fiery for 29 gold?
on a side note Foton. I make use of the google toolbar addon for the "Autofill" feature (i'm very lazy). The "mail" fill in on the "leave a comment" always gets filled with only my name, not my email address (yes I have my email address entered in the autofill options). Just thought I would bring this to your attention. Happy holidays.
item.content:encoded:
Who the hells sells fiery enchant for 29 gold?
moreso, who buys fiery for 29 gold?

on a side note Foton. I make use of the google toolbar addon for the “Autofill” feature (i’m very lazy). The “mail” fill in on the “leave a comment” always gets filled with only my name, not my email address (yes I have my email address entered in the autofill options).
Just thought I would bring this to your attention.
Happy holidays.

item.title: By: gesikah
item.dc:creator: gesikah
item.description: Burn it. In a couple weeks, s/he will be speccing full shadow anyway.
item.content:encoded: Burn it. In a couple weeks, s/he will be speccing full shadow anyway.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Here we are now ... entertain us.
And so you shall be.
Not only did Emo Tank leave in a huff (imagine my guild's collective sigh of relief), but we also lost another long-timer guild dude in an "issue" over a priest applicant. Drama building as I write this since half of us want to burn the Priest's application (by association) and the other half are trying to play the "omg, it's a priest!!" card.
Plus, end of year Lists of Five. The (imaginary) AFK Gamer team has been busy -- even whilst drunk.
item.content:encoded:
Here we are now … entertain us.

And so you shall be.

Not only did Emo Tank leave in a huff (imagine my guild’s collective sigh of relief), but we also lost another long-timer guild dude in an “issue” over a priest applicant. Drama building as I write this since half of us want to burn the Priest’s application (by association) and the other half are trying to play the “omg, it’s a priest!!” card.

Plus, end of year Lists of Five. The (imaginary) AFK Gamer team has been busy — even whilst drunk.

item.title: By: Eradon
item.dc:creator: Eradon
item.description: Not at all, I'm waiting in anger too. But that might just be the jacka$$ gene in me. "WE DEMAND TO BE ENTERTAINED!!"
item.content:encoded:
Not at all, I’m waiting in anger too. But that might just be the jacka$$ gene in me.
“WE DEMAND TO BE ENTERTAINED!!”

item.content:encoded: Is it sad how much I have been looking forward to the next chapter in the emo tank saga?

item.content:encoded: Can you imagine being that person, how awesome that would be, just for a little while. I’d feel like God.
